channel.title: Qubes on KVM? Is it possible?
channel.description:
Hi guys,
Firstly, I'd like to say that I'm a complete newbie when it comes to Qubes. However, I have been searching around but truth to be told, the more I read the more confused I get, so I would like to ask you guys, if it is possible to install Qubes on KVM instead of XEN? I'm trying to install it on my VPS, but it uses KVM virtualization...
I get this error when I try to start the installation: ![vps|690x416](upload://keVBbzFM5BAkEEUQfQABzevclxr.png)
Any help please?

item.title: Qubes on KVM? Is it possible?
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi @OliverHicks

OliverHicks:

if it is possible to install Qubes on KVM instead of XEN?

This is a Qubes specific question that is more suited for the Qubes Mailing list. You may be able to find some answers there.

https://www.qubes-os.org/mailing-lists/

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes on KVM? Is it possible?
